org.spongepowered.api.text.channel

Interface MutableMessageChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMutableMessageChannel, DelegateMutableMessageChannel, SimpleMutableMessageChannel

    public interface MutableMessageChannel
extends MessageChannel
    Represents a channel that takes a message and transforms it for distribution to a mutable list of members.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.text.channel.MessageChannel

        TO_ALL, TO_CONSOLE, TO_NONE, TO_PLAYERS

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addMember

        boolean addMember(MessageReceiver member)
        Adds a member to this channel.
        Parameters:
        member - The member to add
        Returns:
        true if this channel did not already contain the member

      • removeMember

        boolean removeMember(MessageReceiver member)
        Removes a member from this channel.
        Parameters:
        member - The member to remove
        Returns:
        true if this channel contained the specified member

      • clearMembers

        void clearMembers()
        Removes all of the members from this channel.

      • asMutable

        default MutableMessageChannel asMutable()
        Description copied from interface: MessageChannel
        Gets or creates a mutable version of this channel.

        The default behaviour of this method is to copy the current member list into a DelegateMutableMessageChannel, which calls the MessageChannel.transformMessage(Object, MessageReceiver, Text, ChatType) method on this channel.

        Specified by:
        asMutable in interface MessageChannel
        Returns:
        A mutable channel
